name: Inferno 2: Stranded (Ver 0.4)
description:
MAKE SURE TO GO FULL SCREEN

Inferno is a  Survival FPS open world RPG. You play as a stranded US soldier in the middle of soviet Russia. You're going to have to scavenge, kill and defend your camp against Soviet assassins out to hunt for you.

Asset credits:

- Walled city infotech

- Dark tree Dev

- Dmitrii Kutsenko
